mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users( user_id, user_pw, name, email, phone, address ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address} );
INSERT INTO auth( user_id, auth ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{auth} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_no ,u.user_id ,user_pw ,name ,email ,status ,reg_date ,upd_date ,auth FROM users u LEFT OUTER JOIN auth ON u.user_id = auth.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart ( product_no, user_no, user_no2, cart_cnt ) VALUES ( #{productNo}, #{userNo}, #{userNo2}, #{cartCnt} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM flight f left join product p on f.route_no = p.route_no left join route r on f.route_no = r.route_no
